FuncDef: This command configures the primary and secondary multicast plane capacities used when the full complement of possible switch fabrics in the system is not up (at least one possible switch fabric is not provisioned or is down). The rates are defined as a percentage of the total multicast plane capacity which is configured using thetotal-capacitycommand.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the percentage of the total multicast plane capacity to be used for primary multicast planes.
Specifies the percentage of the total multicast plane capacity to be used for secondary multicast planes. Values-0.01 to 100.

ExtraInfo:
Default: primary-percentage 100.00 
secondary-percentage 90.00 
 with SFM5:primary-percentage 87.5 
secondary-percentage 87.5
